g++   -fpermissive -std=c++0x -Wall -O3 -lm -DNSDEBUG   CMakeFiles/InPlaceAsyn.dir/Stencil2DKernel.cpp.o CMakeFiles/InPlaceAsyn.dir/Stencil2DRowDecomposition.cpp.o CMakeFiles/InPlaceAsyn.dir/Stencil2D_main_tmp.cpp.o  -o InPlaceAsyn  -L/lib64/libhwloc.so -rdynamic ../../../src/runtime/libdarts.a ../../../src/abstractmachine/libamm.a -lhwloc ../../../src/rsmanager/librsmanager.a ../../../src/common/libcommon.a -lpthread ../../../src/threading/libcodelet.a ../../../src/scheduler/libscheduler.a ../../../src/threadlocal/libthreadlocal.a -lrt -ltbb -Wl,-rpath,/lib64/libhwloc.so
